item.title: U-Shape Test using "Two Lines"
item.description: Motivation Two-lines Approaches Regression with Clustered Standard Errors and Many Fixed Effects This post shows how to use Two-lines method to test U-shape relationship, and how to estimate the model with clustered standard errors and many fixed effects. Motivation In this paper by Uri Simonsohn (2017), the author proposed a noval method to test U-Shape relationship. In the literature, the popular way of testing U-shapeness relationship between x and y is to add a quadratic term in the regression \(y=\beta_0+\beta_1 x + \beta_2 x^2 +\epsilon\) (\(\epsilon\) is an i.
